4546.verse-arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَصَدُّوا عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
4546.verse-english: Those who disbelieve and avert [people] from the way of Allah - He will waste their deeds.

clauses-english.clause: Those who disbelieve and avert [people] from the way of God -
He will waste their deeds.

4547.verse-arabic: وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَآمَنُوا بِمَا نُزِّلَ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَهُوَ الْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّهِمْ ۙ كَفَّرَ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّئَاتِهِمْ وَأَصْلَحَ بَالَهُمْ
4547.verse-english: And those who believe and do righteous deeds and believe in what has been sent down upon Muhammad - and it is the truth from their Lord - He will remove from them their misdeeds and amend their condition.

clauses-english.clause: And those who believe and do righteous deeds and believe in what has been sent down upon Muhammad -
and it is the truth from their Lord -
He will remove from them their misdeeds and amend their condition.

4548.verse-arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا اتَّبَعُوا الْبَاطِلَ وَأَنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّبَعُوا الْحَقَّ مِن رَّبِّهِمْ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَضْرِبُ اللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ أَمْثَالَهُمْ
4548.verse-english: That is because those who disbelieve follow falsehood, and those who believe follow the truth from their Lord. Thus does Allah present to the people their comparisons.

clauses-english.clause: That is because those who disbelieve follow falsehood,
and those who believe follow the truth from their Lord.
Thus does God present to the people their comparisons.

4549.verse-arabic: فَإِذَا لَقِيتُمُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فَضَرْبَ الرِّقَابِ حَتَّىٰ إِذَا أَثْخَنتُمُوهُمْ فَشُدُّوا الْوَثَاقَ فَإِمَّا مَنًّا بَعْدُ وَإِمَّا فِدَاءً حَتَّىٰ تَضَعَ الْحَرْبُ أَوْزَارَهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَوْ يَشَاءُ اللَّهُ لَانتَصَرَ مِنْهُمْ وَلَٰكِن لِّيَبْلُوَ بَعْضَكُم بِبَعْضٍ ۗ وَالَّذِينَ قُتِلُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ فَلَن يُضِلَّ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
4549.verse-english: So when you meet those who disbelieve [in battle], strike [their] necks until, when you have inflicted slaughter upon them, then secure their bonds, and either [confer] favor afterwards or ransom [them] until the war lays down its burdens. That [is the command]. And if Allah had willed, He could have taken vengeance upon them [Himself], but [He ordered armed struggle] to test some of you by means of others. And those who are killed in the cause of Allah - never will He waste their deeds.

clauses-english.clause: So when you meet those who disbelieve [in battle],
strike [their] necks until,
when you have inflicted slaughter upon them,
then secure their bonds,
and either [confer] favor afterwards or ransom [them] until the war lays down its burdens.
That [is the command].
And if God had willed,
He could have taken vengeance upon them [Himself],
but [He ordered armed struggle] to test some of you by means of others.
And those who are killed in the cause of God -
never will He waste their deeds.

4550.verse-english: He will guide them and amend their condition

clauses-english.clause: He will guide them and amend their condition

4551.verse-english: And admit them to Paradise, which He has made known to them.

clauses-english.clause: And admit them to Paradise,
which He has made known to them.

4552.verse-arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِن تَنصُرُوا اللَّهَ يَنصُرْكُمْ وَيُثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَكُمْ
4552.verse-english: O you who have believed, if you support Allah, He will support you and plant firmly your feet.

clauses-english.clause: O you who have believed,
if you support God,
He will support you and plant firmly your feet.

4553.verse-arabic: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فَتَعْسًا لَّهُمْ وَأَضَلَّ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
4553.verse-english: But those who disbelieve - for them is misery, and He will waste their deeds.

clauses-english.clause: But those who disbelieve -
for them is misery,
and He will waste their deeds.

4554.verse-arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَرِهُوا مَا أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ فَأَحْبَطَ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
4554.verse-english: That is because they disliked what Allah revealed, so He rendered worthless their deeds.

clauses-english.clause: That is because they disliked what God revealed,
so He rendered worthless their deeds.

4555.verse-arabic: ۞ أَفَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ دَمَّرَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ وَلِلْكَافِرِينَ أَمْثَالُهَا
4555.verse-english: Have they not traveled through the land and seen how was the end of those before them? Allah destroyed [everything] over them, and for the disbelievers is something comparable.

clauses-english.clause: Have they not traveled through the land and seen how was the end of those before them?
God destroyed [everything] over them,
and for the disbelievers is something comparable.

4556.verse-arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ مَوْلَى الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَأَنَّ الْكَافِرِينَ لَا مَوْلَىٰ لَهُمْ
4556.verse-english: That is because Allah is the protector of those who have believed and because the disbelievers have no protector.

clauses-arabic.clause: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ مَوْلَى الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَأَنَّ الْكَافِرِينَ لَا مَوْلَىٰ لَهُمْ

clauses-english.clause: That is because God is the protector of those who have believed and because the disbelievers have no protector.

4557.verse-arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُدْخِلُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۖ وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا يَتَمَتَّعُونَ وَيَأْكُلُونَ كَمَا تَأْكُلُ الْأَنْعَامُ وَالنَّارُ مَثْوًى لَّهُمْ
4557.verse-english: Indeed, Allah will admit those who have believed and done righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow, but those who disbelieve enjoy themselves and eat as grazing livestock eat, and the Fire will be a residence for them.

clauses-english.clause: Indeed,
God will admit those who have believed and done righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow,
but those who disbelieve enjoy themselves and eat as grazing livestock eat,
and the Fire will be a residence for them.

4558.verse-arabic: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرْيَةٍ هِيَ أَشَدُّ قُوَّةً مِّن قَرْيَتِكَ الَّتِي أَخْرَجَتْكَ أَهْلَكْنَاهُمْ فَلَا نَاصِرَ لَهُمْ
4558.verse-english: And how many a city was stronger than your city [Makkah] which drove you out? We destroyed them; and there was no helper for them.

clauses-english.clause: And how many a city was stronger than your city [Makkah] which drove you out?
We destroyed them;
and there was no helper for them.

4559.verse-arabic: أَفَمَن كَانَ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِ كَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُ سُوءُ عَمَلِهِ وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُم
4559.verse-english: So is he who is on clear evidence from his Lord like him to whom the evil of his work has been made attractive and they follow their [own] desires?

clauses-arabic.clause: أَفَمَن كَانَ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِ كَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُ سُوءُ عَمَلِهِ وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُم

clauses-english.clause: So is he who is on clear evidence from his Lord like him to whom the evil of his work has been made attractive and they follow their [own] desires?

4560.verse-arabic: مَّثَلُ الْجَنَّةِ الَّتِي وُعِدَ الْمُتَّقُونَ ۖ فِيهَا أَنْهَارٌ مِّن مَّاءٍ غَيْرِ آسِنٍ وَأَنْهَارٌ مِّن لَّبَنٍ لَّمْ يَتَغَيَّرْ طَعْمُهُ وَأَنْهَارٌ مِّنْ خَمْرٍ لَّذَّةٍ لِّلشَّارِبِينَ وَأَنْهَارٌ مِّنْ عَسَلٍ مُّصَفًّى ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ الثَّمَرَاتِ وَمَغْفِرَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ ۖ كَمَنْ هُوَ خَالِدٌ فِي النَّارِ وَسُقُوا مَاءً حَمِيمًا فَقَطَّعَ أَمْعَاءَهُمْ
4560.verse-english: Is the description of Paradise, which the righteous are promised, wherein are rivers of water unaltered, rivers of milk the taste of which never changes, rivers of wine delicious to those who drink, and rivers of purified honey, in which they will have from all [kinds of] fruits and forgiveness from their Lord, like [that of] those who abide eternally in the Fire and are given to drink scalding water that will sever their intestines?

clauses-english.clause: Is the description of Paradise,
which the righteous are promised,
wherein are rivers of water unaltered,
rivers of milk the taste of which never changes,
rivers of wine delicious to those who drink,
and rivers of purified honey,
in which they will have from all [kinds of] fruits and forgiveness from their Lord,
like [that of] those who abide eternally in the Fire and are given to drink scalding water that will sever their intestines?

4561.verse-arabic: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَسْتَمِعُ إِلَيْكَ حَتَّىٰ إِذَا خَرَجُوا مِنْ عِندِكَ قَالُوا لِلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْعِلْمَ مَاذَا قَالَ آنِفًا ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ طَبَعَ اللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُمْ
4561.verse-english: And among them, [O Muhammad], are those who listen to you, until when they depart from you, they say to those who were given knowledge, "What has he said just now?" Those are the ones of whom Allah has sealed over their hearts and who have followed their [own] desires.

clauses-english.clause: And among them,
[O Muhammad],
are those who listen to you,
until when they depart from you,
they say to those who were given knowledge,
"What has he said just now?
" Those are the ones of whom God has sealed over their hearts and who have followed their [own] desires.

4562.verse-arabic: وَالَّذِينَ اهْتَدَوْا زَادَهُمْ هُدًى وَآتَاهُمْ تَقْوَاهُمْ
4562.verse-english: And those who are guided - He increases them in guidance and gives them their righteousness.

clauses-english.clause: And those who are guided -
He increases them in guidance and gives them their righteousness.

4563.verse-arabic: فَهَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا السَّاعَةَ أَن تَأْتِيَهُم بَغْتَةً ۖ فَقَدْ جَاءَ أَشْرَاطُهَا ۚ فَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمْ إِذَا جَاءَتْهُمْ ذِكْرَاهُمْ
4563.verse-english: Then do they await except that the Hour should come upon them unexpectedly? But already there have come [some of] its indications. Then what good to them, when it has come, will be their remembrance?

clauses-english.clause: Then do they await except that the Hour should come upon them unexpectedly?
But already there have come [some of] its indications.
Then what good to them,
when it has come,
will be their remembrance?

4564.verse-arabic: فَاعْلَمْ أَنَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَاسْتَغْفِرْ لِذَنبِكَ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مُتَقَلَّبَكُمْ وَمَثْوَاكُمْ
4564.verse-english: So know, [O Muhammad], that there is no deity except Allah and ask forgiveness for your sin and for the believing men and believing women. And Allah knows of your movement and your resting place.

clauses-english.clause: So know,
[O Muhammad],
that there is no deity except God and ask forgiveness for your sin and for the believing men and believing women.
And God knows of your movement and your resting place.

4565.verse-arabic: وَيَقُولُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَوْلَا نُزِّلَتْ سُورَةٌ ۖ فَإِذَا أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌ مُّحْكَمَةٌ وَذُكِرَ فِيهَا الْقِتَالُ ۙ رَأَيْتَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيْكَ نَظَرَ الْمَغْشِيِّ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ الْمَوْتِ ۖ فَأَوْلَىٰ لَهُمْ
4565.verse-english: Those who believe say, "Why has a surah not been sent down? But when a precise surah is revealed and fighting is mentioned therein, you see those in whose hearts is hypocrisy looking at you with a look of one overcome by death. And more appropriate for them [would have been]

clauses-english.clause: Those who believe say,
"Why has a surah not been sent down?
But when a precise surah is revealed and fighting is mentioned therein,
you see those in whose hearts is hypocrisy looking at you with a look of one overcome by death.
And more appropriate for them [would have been]

4566.verse-arabic: طَاعَةٌ وَقَوْلٌ مَّعْرُوفٌ ۚ فَإِذَا عَزَمَ الْأَمْرُ فَلَوْ صَدَقُوا اللَّهَ لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَّهُمْ
4566.verse-english: Obedience and good words. And when the matter [of fighting] was determined, if they had been true to Allah, it would have been better for them.

clauses-english.clause: Obedience and good words.
And when the matter [of fighting] was determined,
if they had been true to God,
it would have been better for them.

4567.verse-arabic: فَهَلْ عَسَيْتُمْ إِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ أَن تُفْسِدُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَتُقَطِّعُوا أَرْحَامَكُمْ
4567.verse-english: So would you perhaps, if you turned away, cause corruption on earth and sever your [ties of] relationship?

clauses-english.clause: So would you perhaps,
if you turned away,
cause corruption on earth and sever your [ties of] relationship?

4568.verse-arabic: أُولَٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ اللَّهُ فَأَصَمَّهُمْ وَأَعْمَىٰ أَبْصَارَهُمْ
4568.verse-english: Those [who do so] are the ones that Allah has cursed, so He deafened them and blinded their vision.

clauses-english.clause: Those [who do so] are the ones that God has cursed,
so He deafened them and blinded their vision.

4569.verse-arabic: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ الْقُرْآنَ أَمْ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبٍ أَقْفَالُهَا
4569.verse-english: Then do they not reflect upon the Qur'an, or are there locks upon [their] hearts?

clauses-english.clause: Then do they not reflect upon the Qur'an,
or are there locks upon [their] hearts?

4570.verse-arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ ارْتَدُّوا عَلَىٰ أَدْبَارِهِم مِّن بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الْهُدَى ۙ الشَّيْطَانُ سَوَّلَ لَهُمْ وَأَمْلَىٰ لَهُمْ
4570.verse-english: Indeed, those who reverted back [to disbelief] after guidance had become clear to them - Satan enticed them and prolonged hope for them.

clauses-english.clause: Indeed,
those who reverted back [to disbelief] after guidance had become clear to them -
Satan enticed them and prolonged hope for them.

4571.verse-arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَالُوا لِلَّذِينَ كَرِهُوا مَا نَزَّلَ اللَّهُ سَنُطِيعُكُمْ فِي بَعْضِ الْأَمْرِ ۖ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ إِسْرَارَهُمْ
4571.verse-english: That is because they said to those who disliked what Allah sent down, "We will obey you in part of the matter." And Allah knows what they conceal.

clauses-english.clause: That is because they said to those who disliked what God sent down,
"We will obey you in part of the matter.
" And God knows what they conceal.

4572.verse-arabic: فَكَيْفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتْهُمُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ يَضْرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمْ وَأَدْبَارَهُمْ
4572.verse-english: Then how [will it be] when the angels take them in death, striking their faces and their backs?

clauses-english.clause: Then how [will it be] when the angels take them in death,
striking their faces and their backs?

4573.verse-arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ اتَّبَعُوا مَا أَسْخَطَ اللَّهَ وَكَرِهُوا رِضْوَانَهُ فَأَحْبَطَ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
4573.verse-english: That is because they followed what angered Allah and disliked [what earns] His pleasure, so He rendered worthless their deeds.

clauses-english.clause: That is because they followed what angered God and disliked [what earns] His pleasure,
so He rendered worthless their deeds.

4574.verse-arabic: أَمْ حَسِبَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَن لَّن يُخْرِجَ اللَّهُ أَضْغَانَهُمْ
4574.verse-english: Or do those in whose hearts is disease think that Allah would never expose their [feelings of] hatred?

clauses-arabic.clause: أَمْ حَسِبَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَن لَّن يُخْرِجَ اللَّهُ أَضْغَانَهُمْ

clauses-english.clause: Or do those in whose hearts is disease think that God would never expose their [feelings of] hatred?

4575.verse-arabic: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَأَرَيْنَاكَهُمْ فَلَعَرَفْتَهُم بِسِيمَاهُمْ ۚ وَلَتَعْرِفَنَّهُمْ فِي لَحْنِ الْقَوْلِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ أَعْمَالَكُمْ
4575.verse-english: And if We willed, We could show them to you, and you would know them by their mark; but you will surely know them by the tone of [their] speech. And Allah knows your deeds.

clauses-english.clause: And if We willed,
We could show them to you,
and you would know them by their mark;
but you will surely know them by the tone of [their] speech.
And God knows your deeds.

4576.verse-arabic: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُمْ حَتَّىٰ نَعْلَمَ الْمُجَاهِدِينَ مِنكُمْ وَالصَّابِرِينَ وَنَبْلُوَ أَخْبَارَكُمْ
4576.verse-english: And We will surely test you until We make evident those who strive among you [for the cause of Allah] and the patient, and We will test your affairs.

clauses-english.clause: And We will surely test you until We make evident those who strive among you [for the cause of God] and the patient,
and We will test your affairs.

4577.verse-arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَصَدُّوا عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ وَشَاقُّوا الرَّسُولَ مِن بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الْهُدَىٰ لَن يَضُرُّوا اللَّهَ شَيْئًا وَسَيُحْبِطُ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
4577.verse-english: Indeed, those who disbelieved and averted [people] from the path of Allah and opposed the Messenger after guidance had become clear to them - never will they harm Allah at all, and He will render worthless their deeds.

clauses-english.clause: Indeed,
those who disbelieved and averted [people] from the path of God and opposed the Messenger after guidance had become clear to them -
never will they harm God at all,
and He will render worthless their deeds.

4578.verse-arabic: ۞ يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا الرَّسُولَ وَلَا تُبْطِلُوا أَعْمَالَكُمْ
4578.verse-english: O you who have believed, obey Allah and obey the Messenger and do not invalidate your deeds.

clauses-english.clause: O you who have believed,
obey God and obey the Messenger and do not invalidate your deeds.

4579.verse-arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَصَدُّوا عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ثُمَّ مَاتُوا وَهُمْ كُفَّارٌ فَلَن يَغْفِرَ اللَّهُ لَهُمْ
4579.verse-english: Indeed, those who disbelieved and averted [people] from the path of Allah and then died while they were disbelievers - never will Allah forgive them.

clauses-english.clause: Indeed,
those who disbelieved and averted [people] from the path of God and then died while they were disbelievers -
never will God forgive them.

4580.verse-arabic: فَلَا تَهِنُوا وَتَدْعُوا إِلَى السَّلْمِ وَأَنتُمُ الْأَعْلَوْنَ وَاللَّهُ مَعَكُمْ وَلَن يَتِرَكُمْ أَعْمَالَكُمْ
4580.verse-english: So do not weaken and call for peace while you are superior; and Allah is with you and will never deprive you of [the reward of] your deeds.

clauses-english.clause: So do not weaken and call for peace while you are superior;
and God is with you and will never deprive you of [the reward of] your deeds.

4581.verse-arabic: إِنَّمَا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا لَعِبٌ وَلَهْوٌ ۚ وَإِن تُؤْمِنُوا وَتَتَّقُوا يُؤْتِكُمْ أُجُورَكُمْ وَلَا يَسْأَلْكُمْ أَمْوَالَكُمْ
4581.verse-english: [This] worldly life is only amusement and diversion. And if you believe and fear Allah, He will give you your rewards and not ask you for your properties.

clauses-english.clause: [This] worldly life is only amusement and diversion.
And if you believe and fear God,
He will give you your rewards and not ask you for your properties.

4582.verse-arabic: إِن يَسْأَلْكُمُوهَا فَيُحْفِكُمْ تَبْخَلُوا وَيُخْرِجْ أَضْغَانَكُمْ
4582.verse-english: If He should ask you for them and press you, you would withhold, and He would expose your unwillingness.

clauses-english.clause: If He should ask you for them and press you,
you would withhold,
and He would expose your unwillingness.

4583.verse-arabic: هَا أَنتُمْ هَٰؤُلَاءِ تُدْعَوْنَ لِتُنفِقُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ فَمِنكُم مَّن يَبْخَلُ ۖ وَمَن يَبْخَلْ فَإِنَّمَا يَبْخَلُ عَن نَّفْسِهِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ الْغَنِيُّ وَأَنتُمُ الْفُقَرَاءُ ۚ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوْا يَسْتَبْدِلْ قَوْمًا غَيْرَكُمْ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُونُوا أَمْثَالَكُم
4583.verse-english: Here you are - those invited to spend in the cause of Allah - but among you are those who withhold [out of greed]. And whoever withholds only withholds [benefit] from himself; and Allah is the Free of need, while you are the needy. And if you turn away, He will replace you with another people; then they will not be the likes of you.

clauses-english.clause: Here you are -
those invited to spend in the cause of God -
but among you are those who withhold [out of greed].
And whoever withholds only withholds [benefit] from himself;
and God is the Free of need,
while you are the needy.
And if you turn away,
He will replace you with another people;
then they will not be the likes of you.
